description: This version of the  Boy emoji has the  Light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Pale Skin Tone on supported platforms. Copy and
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, this boy emoji showcases a friendly, youthful face with bright, curious eyes and a gentle smile, rendered with Apple's signature soft rounded edges and realistic lighting. His light skin tone is depicted with subtle gradients and a touch of gloss, embodying innocence and optimism in digital conversations. This emoji is frequently used to represent children, youth, or a sense of playful innocence on Apple devices.
